welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kruibeke, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its unique culture and local experiences."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Brussels Airport, serving a majority of international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
